The VL (Fig. 19-7) is composed of two functional parts: the VL and the vastus lateralis oblique (VLO). The VL has a line of pull of about 12–15 degrees to the long axis of the femur in the frontal plane, whereas the VLO has a pull of 38–48 degrees.
